
---
title: 'RedmiBook Pro 14_15 增强版上架：最高搭载 i7-11390H+3.2K 90Hz 屏'
categories: 
 - 新媒体
 - IT 之家
 - 热榜
headimg: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/8/4507b75d-69bc-46ed-8d99-3e0352fb45f0.png'
author: IT 之家
comments: false
date: Sat, 21 Aug 2021 09:32:31 GMT
thumbnail: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/8/4507b75d-69bc-46ed-8d99-3e0352fb45f0.png'
---

<div>   
<p><a class="s_tag" href="https://www.ithome.com/" target="_blank">IT之家</a> 8 月 21 日消息 RedmiBook Pro 14 与 RedmiBook Pro 15 笔记本增强版现已上架，与标准版相比处理器由 i5-11300H 和 i7-11370H 升级为 i5-11320H 和 i7-11390H。</p><p><strong>RedmiBook Pro 14 增强版</strong></p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p>i5-11320H+16GB+512GB + 锐炬 Xe+2.5K 屏 4699 元</p></li><li><p>i5-11320H+16GB+512GB+MX450+2.5K 屏 5299 元</p></li><li><p>i7-11390H+16GB+512GB+MX450+2.5K 屏 5999 元</p></li></ul><p><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/8/4507b75d-69bc-46ed-8d99-3e0352fb45f0.png" w="516" h="367" title="RedmiBook Pro 14/15 增强版上架：最高搭载 i7-11390H+3.2K 90Hz 屏" width="516" height="367" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p><strong>RedmiBook Pro 15 增强版</strong></p><ul class="ai-word-checked list-paddingleft-2"><li><p>i5-11320H+16GB+512GB + 锐炬 Xe+3.2K 90Hz 屏 4999 元</p></li><li><p>i5-11320H+16GB+512GB+MX450+3.2K 90Hz 屏 5499 元</p></li><li><p>i7-11390H+16GB+512GB+MX450+3.2K 90Hz 屏 6299 元</p></li></ul><p><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/8/de41ea8a-a870-4590-bbcb-d1c87c7dea0a.png" w="594" h="406" title="RedmiBook Pro 14/15 增强版上架：最高搭载 i7-11390H+3.2K 90Hz 屏" width="594" height="406" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p>IT之家了解到，RedmiBook Pro 14 与 RedmiBook Pro 15 增强版采用可选配 MX450 显卡，采用二合一指纹电源，配备雷电 4 与 USB-C 接口。</p><p>屏幕方面，RedmiBook Pro 14 增强版采用 2.5K 超视网膜全面屏拥有 2560×1600 分辨率与 100% sRGB 色域覆盖，支持 DC 调光。</p><p><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/8/28cce82b-229f-4c92-978d-41008360f6c0.png" w="495" h="354" title="RedmiBook Pro 14/15 增强版上架：最高搭载 i7-11390H+3.2K 90Hz 屏" width="495" height="354" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p>RedmiBook Pro 15 增强版则采用 15.6 英寸 3.2K 90Hz 超视网膜全面屏，拥有 3200×2000 分辨率与 100% sRGB 色域覆盖。</p><p><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/8/e7ce3aa1-5913-4557-84ab-ace841dfc1ba.png" w="608" h="418" title="RedmiBook Pro 14/15 增强版上架：最高搭载 i7-11390H+3.2K 90Hz 屏" width="608" height="418" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><dir><a contenteditable="false"
